hosts.name: PowerShell 7.2.7
hosts.description: PowerShell 7.2.7 for Windows. Includes PowerShell runtime.

hosts.name: PowerShell 7.2.7 - Windows Forms
hosts.description: PowerShell 7.2.7 Windows host with Windows Forms support. Includes PowerShell runtime.

hosts.name: PowerShell 7.2.7 - Lightweight
hosts.description: PowerShell 7.2.7 for Windows. Does not include the PowerShell runtime. PowerShell 7.2.7 or later needs to be installed on the target machine.

hosts.name: PowerShell 7.2.7 - Windows Forms - Lightweight
hosts.description: PowerShell 7.2.7 Windows host with Windows Forms support. Does not include the PowerShell runtime. PowerShell 7.2.7 or later needs to be installed on the target machine.
